item.description:
THANK YOU.>>>> SOLD OUT <<<<


The Original Steppers of Boston have provided a unique opportunity for its members to attend and possibly step at the "Universoul Circus" on Wednesday June 30, 2010, 7:30pm show.

This opportunity and tickets is for our members and their guests (friends/family/kids). So email (RSVP) the Organizer first, then RVSP (plus # of guests)on Meetup.

The Tickets in Section F are just $20 per person (includes service fees). Only cash or **PayPal (credit card payable to steppersboston06@aol.com) are accepted by 1am on Friday 6/18/10. So we will all sit together. Sorry no personal checks accepted. Act now before tickets sell out for the final time.

**PayPal payments should be sent to " steppersboston06@aol.com "

We have been waiting for this opportunity for a year, other steppin organizations around the nation have attended this event in the past years. Now it is Boston's turn.

Contact the Organizer with any questions

Location:

UniverSoul Circus
Northeastern University Columbus Ave. Parking Lot
Boston, MA
(next to Ruggles Orange Line/Commuter Rail T Station)

Special thanks to TOUCH 106.1FM

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: SOLD OUT - Steppers at the UniverSoul Circus 6/30/10
